full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA NAG DBANG PHYUG CHEN PO ZOR MDOS GLUD 'BUL TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(DBANG PHYUG CHEN PO ZOR MDOS GLUD 'BUL TSUL ZHES PA 'DI NI BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA'I SKU GZHOGS GRVA TSANG PHAN BDE GSANG SNGAGS KYI GLING GI BSTAN SRID KYI BLO RIGS DANG LDAN PA, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA'I MDZAD PA'O, ,)
